summary: A Major leads a group of mercenaries whose mission is to protect a disc full of secrets, located in South Asia.
cast: Lewis Collins|Lee Van Cleef|Donald Pleasence|Manfred Lehmann|Brett Halsey|Chat Silayan|Hans Leutenegger|Christian Brückner|Frank Glaubrecht|Thomas Danneberg|Anita Lochner|Wolfgang Kühne|Paul Muller|Bobby Rhodes|Romano Puppo|Antonio Cantafora|John Steiner|David Brass|Protacio Dee|David Light|Edoardo Margheriti|Mike Monty|Ilse Pagé|Steve Rogers|Willy Schober|Willie Williams
director: Director: Antonio Margheriti (as Anthony M. Dawson)
title: Comando suicida
